1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: GROOVY FOODS is a cooking show with a target audience 15 to 30 who live a young, active, healthy and organic lifestyle.. Our hosts are two dynamic, beautiful, and vibrant, young, multi-racial sisters named, Lenka and Eva who live in Malibu. The beginning of each episode will have an intro with our hosts Lenka and Eva and then feature our stars having fun and shopping in all of the wonderful, eclectic, and organic farms, stores, orchards and vineyards in the Malibu area. The preparation segment will follow and the show will end with a different "EVENT" each episode.. This can be anything from a beach party with friends to just Lenka and Eva sitting at the kitchen counter. We also plan to occasionally devote an episode to "Food Not Bombs" and other similar organizations.
imdb.title: Groovy Foods!
